mapper.select: SELECT c.danzi_id AS danziId, c.comment_id AS commentId, c.content, c.user_id AS userId, u.nickname, c.is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM comments c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.danzi_id = #{danziId} AND c.is_deleted = false ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (danzi_id, content, user_id, nickname, is_deleted) SELECT #{danziId}, #{content}, #{userId}, u.nickname, false FROM users u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
